rules_text:
Whenever this creature transforms, for each non-enchanted creature you control, create a Sorcery Role token attached to them.
[i]Foreblaze[/i] – Whenever you cast a sorcery spell, Lilina deals X damage to target opponent, where X is equal to the number of charge counters on her. Then proliferate.
[i]Armads[/i] – Whenever you cast an instant spell, Lilina deals X damage to target creature an opponent controls, where X is equal to the number of charge counters on her. Then proliferate.
